vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ACCURAL_DEPOSIT.collect (patch_4.sol#35-41):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_4.sol#37-40)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_4.sol#38)
